player
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayer
public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
implements IPlayer

Main character of the Tron game. A player carries an inventory and is trailed by a light trail. During the game a player can perform 3 actions during a turn. These actions are move, pickup an item, use an item and end the turn.

Field Summary
static int MAX_NUMBER_OF_ACTIONS_PER_TURN
          The maximum number of actions a Player is allowed to do in one turn.

public static final int MAX_NUMBER_OF_ACTIONS_PER_TURN

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(@NotNull
              Coordinate startCoordinate,
              @NotNull
              IGrid grid)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
              java.lang.IllegalStateException
Creates a new Player object, with an empty inventory, who has not yet moved and has an allowed nb of actions of 3. The specified coordinate is the starting position of the player.

Parameters:
startCoordinate - The starting position of the player
grid - The grid the player will move on
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given arguments cannot be null.
java.lang.IllegalStateException - The given coordinate must exist on the given grid

endTurn

public void endTurn()
             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Description copied from interface: IPlayer
This method ends the turn of this player. This player will lose the game if this method is called before he did a move action, (i.e. if this.hasMovedYet() is false when calling this method, this player loses the game).

Specified by:
endTurn in interface IPlayer
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - The end turn preconditions must be satisfied, i.e. IPlayer.isPreconditionEndTurnSatisfied()

isPreconditionEndTurnSatisfied

public boolean isPreconditionEndTurnSatisfied()
Description copied from interface: IPlayer
Returns whether this player is allowed to perform an end turn action. A player is allowed to perform an end turn action if he has performed less then MAX_NUMBER_OF_ACTIONS_PER_TURN in his current turn, IPlayer.getAllowedNumberOfActions() > 0.

Specified by:
isPreconditionEndTurnSatisfied in interface IPlayer
Returns:
whether this player is allowed to perform an end turn action.

isValidDirection

public boolean isValidDirection(Direction direction)
Description copied from interface: IPlayer
Returns whether a specified direction is a valid direction for this player to try to move in. A player can try to move in every non-null direction.

Specified by:
isValidDirection in interface IPlayer
Parameters:

isPreconditionMoveSatisfied

public boolean isPreconditionMoveSatisfied()
Description copied from interface: IPlayer
Returns whether this player is allowed to perform a move action. A player is allowed to perform an move action if he has performed less then MAX_NUMBER_OF_ACTIONS_PER_TURN in his current turn, IPlayer.getAllowedNumberOfActions() > 0.

Specified by:

Returns:

Description copied from interface: IPlayer
Pick up the given item. The item must be on the square the player is currently on.

useItem

public void useItem(IItem i)
Description copied from interface: IPlayer
Use the given item. The item must be in the inventory of the player.

Specified by:
useItem in interface IPlayer
Parameters:
i - The item that will be used.

reset

public void reset()
resets the player for a new game. The inventory and the lightTrail will be reinitialized. The number of actions left is set to MAX_NUMBER_OF_ACTIONS_PER_TURN. Also hasMovedYet() will return false.oldSquare
